RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEEN OF THE MOON in the main body up the backstretch outside, ranged up five wide to challenge five wide turning for home, put a head in front past the furlong marker, drew clear under steady handling. LIGHTENING MO lacked early foot off the inside, three to four wide in the turn when still off the pace, steered out widest approaching midstretch, closed with good resolve to be up for the place, not a real threat to the winner. PORTO DEL ACE forwardly placed three wide up the backstretch, advanced, challenged four wide into the lane between foes and inside the winner, could not match strides with that one the final furlong nor contain the runner up, proved game for the show. MISS ST. CLAIRE close from the start, chased the clear into and through the turn, challenged three wide and between foes into the stretch, briefly gained the advantage in upper stretch, began to gradually weaken soon after, outkicked late for the show while along the rail at the wire. STARSHIP NOLA last to leave, trailed for over a half, came five wide for the drive, displayed some belated interest down the middle of the strip to improve position. SWEET ALEXIS pulled onto the main track inside, raced in traffic in mid pack through the turn, lodged a brief and mild bid in the two path between horses when straightened for home then faltered. GRACE HAZEL in the second flight early, fell back, lacked a closing kick. REMEMBERIN RONALD sprinted clear soon after the start to show the way out of the chute, continued to set the pace into and through the turn along the inside, gave way when headed in upper stretch. YOCKEY BETTERFLY forwardly placed in the early going, began a steady retreat before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Alexis
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled onto the main track, traffic turn, mild bid, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Lightening Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 4w into lane, steered out 1/8, up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nola
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, 5w into lane, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Grace Hazel
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth and Eddie Delahoussaye Bloodstock LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, fell back, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Yockey Betterfly
ENTRY.OWNER: Whitley Ranch and Racing LLC and Whitley Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Porto Del Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward 3w early, 4w bid btwn into lane, determined 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberin Ronald
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear early, pace inside, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body outside, ranged up 5w into lane, bid, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Miss St. Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from the start, 3w bid, vied, outkicked late for 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 69. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DASHYNS DREAM broke in but alertly, showed the way into the first turn, continued to set the pace while rating kindly, shrugged off pursuer turning for home, clear again. maintained daylight to the wire. VIEWING TRAIL moved closer before a half, challenged outside the winner into the stretch, could not match that one to the wire, remained well clear for the second spot. AVENDORE back off the pace outside, moved closer four wide through the final turn, proved no match top two through the lane. HONEST ANGUS lacked early foot, moved closer after four furlongs, flattened out a bit in the drive, outkicked for the show. SARATOGA PASODOBLE broke out, chased the winner for five furlongs, weakened. PLANTS AND BIRDS within striking distance for five furlongs, tired. VANCOUVER SNOW remained back in failing to menace. EASY ACT last away, trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Honest Angus
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, closer after half, outkicked 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Pasodoble
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, chased early, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Act
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Dashyns Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in but alertly, pace inside, rated, shrugged off foe, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean & Pope McLean Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Plants and Birds
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, tired after five furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Viewing Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer before a half, bid turning for home, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Vancouver Snow
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Avendore
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, closer four wide 2nd turn, no match top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOLLY TOMMY broke with the field, stalked the pace three wide up the backstretch, fell back off the two leaders early in the turn, asked along midway on the bend, advanced and challenged outside the dueling duo into the lane, drove steadily clear under pressure. CRIMSON STORM away well, dueled up front along the inside, continued to alternated up front into and through the turn, offered little resistance to the winner in upper stretch, drew well clear for the second spot. FLASHY BOY GOES broke on top, set or forced the pace in the two path for five furlongs, weakened from between the top two upper stretch, comfortably saved the show. QUARTER RAT went one paced throughout while racing in the two path. JAMAICAN ME fell back, moved off the inside, three wide into the lane, failed to menace while picking off a couple of tiring rivals late. BAQUERO'S BIND in mid pack while racing between horses, lacked a closing response through the stretch,. TIME TO MOVE void of speed, improved position along the inside turning for home, faltered the final furlong to lose several spots. SIR POKERFACE last away, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Time to Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, improved inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced while off the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Quarter Rat
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout while in the two path

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Tommy
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell Heath Aaron and Campbell Sheena
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early 3w, outside bid, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy Goes
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Baquero's Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack between foes, lacked response drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Pokerface
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 81. Claiming Purse 16500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 7 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY LITTLE JEN outrun early while off the inside, asked along late backstretch, dropped to the rail when idling along second turn, slipped inside the leader to challenge entering the straight, drove clear under firm handling. EMPTY NET dueled up front closest to the inside, garnered a daylight advantage before a half, continued to hold a daylight advantage through the final turn, allowed the winner the inside in upper stretch, proved no match for that one late, held sway for the place. MEAN AMERICAN broke with leaders, settled off the pace, continued one paced in lacking a late kick, finished up best of the rest. BEAUTIFUL ENDING lacked early foot, four wide into the stretch, improved position a bit with some mild, belated interest. ANN'S STORM last away, trailed in lacking early foot, improved along the inside second turn, in a bit tight when straightened for home, went flat the final furlong. US SECOND CUTE PIE lacked early foot, failed to muster a rally when called on. BLUE RIDGE QUEEN broke on top, dueled early outside the runner up, fell back off that one after a half and continued to fade.

ENTRY.NAME: Us Second Cute Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, failed to muster a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Empty Net
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, larger lead 2p, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Mean American
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout, not enough for the place

ENTRY.NAME: My Little Jen
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun off the inside, dropped in far turn, rail bid, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Ending
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 4w into lane, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Ann's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, improved 2nd turn, bit tight 3/16, flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled early 2p, steady fade

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EASY CHANCE broke out, cleared to the inside, set all the pace, drew out through upper stretch under a steady hand ride, coasted home to win ridden out. PALANTE broke back, void of speed, continued back while well out in the strip through the turn, came five wide for the drive, finished willingly down the center of the strip to be far clear of the rest, no a serious threat to the winner. JACKIE MOON last away, settled off the pace and the inside, asked along three to four wide turning for home, along for the show while not a threat to the top pair. COUNT ON RAIN back off the pace and the rail, improved through some traffic stretch, outkicked for the show spot while along the rail at the end. ST JOE void of speed, shuffled back to trail early in the turn, roused three wide into the lane, improved position without posing a serious threat. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER chased the winner while off the inside for over a half, had little left the final furlong to lose several positions,. ETBAUER'S SECRET settled off the pace, backed up through the lane. GEM OF CARLOS tired while racing outside. SABERMAN forwardly placed in the early going, steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Saberman
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, asked 3-4w into lane, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Etbauer's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Count On Rain
ENTRY.OWNER: Benoit James Bourque Peggy and Bourque Sr Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, improved through traffic, outkicked 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Gem of Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired after racing outside

ENTRY.NAME: Palante
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, 5w into lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared to inside, all the pace, drew out, coasted

ENTRY.NAME: Cottonclub Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner off rail, little left

ENTRY.NAME: St Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, shuffled back into turn, improved, no real threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 92. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 7, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIEF CHARLIE closest to the leader off the inside, joined that one from the outside after a half, long, spirited duel to the wire, narrowly gained the nod at the end. MI SOLUTION underwent a shoe repair in the paddock, broke on top, showed the way past the wire the first time, continued to set the pace onto the backstretch, responded when confronted by the winner late backstretch, alternated up front inside that one to the wire, narrowly missed, held clear for the place. GAMETIME GLADIATOR off the early pace off the inside, moved up to race in the second flight between horses into the far turn, chased the top two into the straight, slowly closing the gap on that pair along the inside. OVERANALYTICAL within striking distance, fell back while four wide into the lane, went evenly to the wire in lacking a closing punch. READY SHOES broke back, lacked speed, continued to lag into the far turn, improved position through traffic down the stretch with some mild, belated interest. MAZING MARK last away, trailed early, improved turning for home then flattened out. PAYNT BATTLE settled in mid pack, raced five wide out of the final turn, had little for the run to the wire. SCORING DRIVE raced in the second flight early, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Scoring Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top. pace inside, extended duel,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Mazing Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed early, improved into lane, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Overanalytical
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, fell back into the lane, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, had little for the drive while 5w

ENTRY.NAME: Gametime Gladiator
ENTRY.COMMENT: off early pace, 2nd flight between foes, rail stretch, slow gain

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, bid, long duel 2p, narrowly gained nod

ENTRY.NAME: Ready Shoes
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, mild late interest to improve

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOME VISIT broke on top, dueled up front in the two path, headed, vied three wide through the final turn, rebroke turning for home and drew strongly clear. DRILLING REPORT in the second flight early along the inside, launched an early bid up the inside to wrest control just before a half, narrowly showed the way through most of the final turn, proved no match for the winner in the drive, remained clear for the second spot. MONARCH'S MISCHIEF in a bit tight at the break, lacked speed, crept closer through the second turn, closest to the top two past the furlong marker, had little for that pair late, narrowly gained the nod for the show. DREWHUSTLE pulled early when a bit slow to settle, raced on the outside through the second turn, mild late interest to miss the show. BIND FAITH broke back, trailed most of the way in failing to respond. CALCULATED broke in, moved up to duel inside the winner, allowed the runner up the inside late backstretch, vied between horses into the far turn, gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Drilling Report
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, rail bid 1/2, no match stretch, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Monarch's Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tight break, lacked speed, improved into lane, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Calculated
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, moved up to duel inside, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bind Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed most of way, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Drewhustle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled, bit slow to settle early, outside 2nd turn, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Home Visit
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled, vied 3w into lane, rebroke upper stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: D. S. Shine Young Futurity EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Stakes Purse 70000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Free to nominate and start, $700 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $1400 will be accepted at time of entries which will include all fees. $70,000 guaranteed to be divided per the condition book st ake structure payout percentages per field size. Weight: 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden or claiming allowed 3 lbs. Maidens 5 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest earnings at time of entry. Different owner entries and same ownere ntries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNING ARGUMENT in mid pack early outside, raced on the outside in the second flight into the turn, made a four wide move to challenge turning for home, took command, edged clear under steady handling. GIRL LIKES BLING in the second group while along the inside, cut the corner into the lane, chased the winner past the furlong marker, could do little with that one in the run to the wire, held sway for the place. EMILY'S BULLET slipped a bit at the start, raced back early while outside, improved a bit in the five path late in the turn, steered out a bit more for room approaching midstretch, finished willingly to be closing the gap on the runner up. BOHEMIAN JIGGLES lacked speed toward the inside, two path into the lane, shifted out with a furlong to run, improved position with some late interest. TAP GALORE veered in break, was straightened to race in the main group after moving out early, closer four wide late in the turn, flattened out through the lane to finish up evenly. SARAH'S COURT broke with the field, mid pack and inside up the backstretch, shuffled back then steadied along the rail into the turn, fell back,moved out, six wide into the lane, improved slightly. CUSTOM SUNSHINE broke with the leaders, vied up front while between horses, continued to press the issue into the lane, weakened through the lane. CRUSIN LIKE A CAT broke back, lacked speed, five wide into the stretch, lacked a serious closing response. HART'S PRETTY GIRL fell back to trail after the start, continued to lack speed, fanned seven wide into the lane, also lacked a meaningful response. JAYDYN CAT moved up to set the pace and clear after the break, continued to show the way turn, gave way in the drive. ASTROLOGY GIRL broke sharp, prompted the pace for over three furlongs outside, stopped stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in break, some traffic 3/8, closer 4w 1/4, falttened

ENTRY.NAME: Crusin Like a Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 5w into lane, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with field, inside, shuffled, steadied 7/16, 6w into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Bohemian Jiggles
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 2p into lane, improved, some late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Girl Likes Bling
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group, cut corner into lane, could not match winner,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Hart's Pretty Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, void of speed, fanned 7w into lane, back

ENTRY.NAME: Running Argument
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, 2nd flight outside early turn, 4w move, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Emily's Bullet
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Our Blue Streaks Stable and Pomier Chasey Deville
ENTRY.COMMENT: slipped bit start, back off pace, 5w into lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Jaydyn Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to take control after the start, pace inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Sunshine
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders, vied up front btwn foes, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, pressed 3w, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REGINALD AURELIUS with the pace while being asked to maintain inside position early, continued to narrowly show the way through the turn, shook clear into lane, held. AWESOME CAJUN fell back off the early pace, moved off the inside, steered out wider to be five wide into the lane, finished willingly to earn the place while well out in the strip, slowly getting to winner. MAGIC BIND last to leave, void of speed for three furlongs, fanned seven wide exiting the turn, also showed some late mettle to be in time for the show. WILDCATS'S MEOW fell back after the start, raced inside of several rivals entering the stretch, improved through traffic. MARVINS' WARRIOR with the early pace outside the winner, dueled with that one through the turn then weakened through the stretch. ARKANSAS ZONG broke near the rear, continued back, was six wide and between horses into the lane while outside the runner up, finished up evenly. FRIEND'S DO CARE forwardly placed early outside, four wide into the turn, weakened through the stretch. TYLER'S SENSATION prompted the issue early out in the strip, shuffled back three wide early in the turn, continued to fade stretch. FLASH OF RAIN broke sharp, pressed early, angled in a bit behind the dueling leaders midway on the turn, traffic late in the bend, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Cajun
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, steered 5w into lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcats's Meow
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, inside late turn, improved thru traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Reginald Aurelius
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace inside, shook clear, upper

ENTRY.NAME: Arkansas Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke near the rear, back, 6w into lane between foes, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, fanned 7w into lane, up late show

ENTRY.NAME: Marvins' Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the early pace, dueled turn 2p, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Flash of Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, pressed, moved in,traffic 1/4, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Tyler's Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, shuffled back 3w 3/8 continued to fade

ENTRY.NAME: Friend's Do Care
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, 4w 3/8, weakened drive
